description: This Python script demonstrates how to use the Agno framework's agent to generate speech from text using OpenAI models and tools, and optionally save the generated audio to a file.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent that interacts with models and tools to perform tasks.

methods.name: Agent.run
methods.description: Executes the agent with a given prompt to generate a response, potentially including audio data.

methods.name: save_base64_data
methods.description: Saves base64-encoded audio data to a specified file.

methods.name: response.get_content_as_string
methods.description: Retrieves the textual content of the agent's response.
